txt.en: Look for clues of the Huorn corruption
The bark of this Huorn is black and rotten
Look for clues of the Huorn corruption
The bark of this Huorn is black and rotten
Silverbark Huorns can be found in the southern Wildwood.\n\nThornmane has asked you to defeat Silverbark Huorns and look for clues.
The bark of this Huorn is black and rotten
Defeat Shadowbark Huorns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The bark of this Huorn is black and rotten
Defeated Shadowbark Huorns ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thornmane is located in the southern Wildwood.\n\nYou should bring the rotted bark to Thornmane.
DNT - Talk to Thornmane
Talk to Thornmane

DNT - 'Thank you for dealing with the violent Huorns, Little One. The piece of bark that you brought to me is full of shadow and rot. Give me a brief moment. I will speak to the Wildwood. Perhaps the trees know something.'
Look for clues of the Huorn corruption

'The darkness that has warped the Huorns of the Wildwood is quite concerning, hoom. I fear the corruption will spread throughout the rest of the forest. You must put the Shadowbark Huorns to rest, [placeholder]. While you are doing so, look for anything that might teach us what has whipped the Huorns into such a fury.'
Huorns stomp through the southern Wildwood. They must be defeated lest their corruption spreads.
Look for clues of the Huorn corruption

'Thank you for dealing with the violent Huorns, friend. The piece of bark you brought me is full of shadow and rot. Give me a brief moment. I will speak to the Wildwood. Perhaps the trees know something.'
Hunting Huorns
'The Huorns of the Wildwood are unnaturally aggressive. We must find the reason why.'
Shadowbark Huorns can be found in the southern Wildwood.\n\nThornmane has asked you to defeat Shadowbark Huorns and look for clues.
